[[Version 1.4]]
*The Alley Flash was re-released during the March 17th [[Epitome Invocation/2021-03-17|Epitome Invocation]] event [[wish]] with a new refinement effect. Below lists the refinement at level 1:
**{{Color|Old effect:}} Continuously sprinting for at least 1s increases ATK by 28% for 6s. This effect cannot stack.
**{{Color|New effect:}} Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 12%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.
